name: Kiss me (Love Jam 2017)
description:
This game was created to celebrate the Love Jam 2017.

It is a story about a guy who loves his girlfriend, and tries to help her in her moments of depression, anxiety and sadness. Your goal is to paint the world on colorful colors to her and make her feel better.

EDIT - The game is FINISHED! Finally haha, better late than never.

I worked 8 more hours after the jam.
